emailSlug.title: Supplier Invoice Email
emailSlug.description: Receive supplier invoices directly via email. Share this address with your suppliers to have their invoices automatically added to your inbox.
emailSlug.infoText: Suppliers can send invoices to this address. The invoices will appear in your Supplier Invoice Inbox for processing.
emailSlug.historyNote: Previous email addresses remain active and will forward invoices to your organization.
emailSlug.confirmWarning1: Your primary email address will change
emailSlug.confirmWarning2: The old address will remain active and forward invoices
emailSlug.confirmWarning3: We recommend notifying your suppliers of the new address

errors.Slug must be at least 3 characters: Address must be at least 3 characters

simplified.title: Accounting Setup
simplified.description: We'll configure the standard accounting setup used by most Swedish SMBs.

simplified.recommendationText: Based on your company size, we recommend this standard configuration which covers 90% of Swedish businesses.

k1.title: K1 - Micro Companies
k1.description: Simplified accounting for very small businesses

accrual.title: Accrual Accounting (Faktureringsmetoden)
accrual.description: Record revenue when invoiced and expenses when bills received. Standard method for most businesses.

cash.title: Cash Accounting (Kontantmetoden)
cash.description: Record revenue when paid and expenses when paid. Only available for companies with revenue under 3M SEK.

kontoplan.title: Chart of Accounts
kontoplan.selectDescription: Choose the account structure that best fits your business type.

simplified.usingStandard: We've configured the standard Swedish chart of accounts (BAS 2024) for you.

banner.title: We value your privacy
banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. By clicking 'Accept All', you consent to our use of cookies.

settings.title: Cookie Settings
settings.description: Manage your cookie preferences. You can change these settings at any time.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They enable core functionality such as authentication, security, and session management.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve user experience.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites and display relevant advertisements. They may also be used to measure advertising campaign effectiveness.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: These cookies remember your preferences such as language, region, and display settings to provide a more personalized experience.

policy.title: Cookie Policy
policy.whatAreCookiesText: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.
policy.howWeUseCookiesText: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website, remember your preferences, understand how you use our services, and analyze site performance.
policy.manageCookiesText: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time by visiting the Cookie Settings page. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of the website.

notifications.preferencesSaved: Your cookie preferences have been saved
notifications.preferencesError: Failed to save cookie preferences. Please try again.

vatReport.vatPayableNote: This amount should be paid to Skatteverket by the filing deadline.
vatReport.vatReceivableNote: This amount can be claimed back from Skatteverket.

errors.alreadyProcessed: This item has already been processed
errors.noAttachment: This item has no attachment to process

hero.title: Professional Invoice & Accounting for Swedish Businesses
hero.subtitle: Streamline your invoicing, accounting, and financial reporting with our all-in-one platform built for Swedish compliance.

auth.termsAgreement: By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

features.title: Everything You Need to Run Your Business
features.subtitle: From invoicing to financial reporting, Svethna has you covered.

invoicing.title: Professional Invoicing
invoicing.description: Create beautiful, compliant invoices in seconds. Support for Swedish requirements, recurring billing, and automatic reminders.

accounting.title: Integrated Accounting
accounting.description: Full double-entry accounting with BAS kontoplan, automated posting, and Swedish K-regelverk support (K1-K4).

multiCurrency.title: Multi-Currency Support
multiCurrency.description: Work with international clients. Automatic exchange rates, currency conversion, and multi-currency reporting.

collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
collaboration.description: Work together seamlessly. Role-based permissions, audit trails, and real-time collaboration for your team.

compliance.title: Swedish Compliance Built-In
compliance.description: F-tax, VAT, ROT/RUT deductions, and Skatteverket requirements. We handle the Swedish regulations so you don't have to.

automation.title: Powerful Automation
automation.description: Save hours with OCR invoice scanning, automatic posting, recurring invoices, and payment matching.

saveTime.title: Save 10+ Hours Per Week
saveTime.description: Automate repetitive tasks and focus on growing your business instead of managing paperwork.

compliance.title: Stay Compliant Effortlessly
compliance.description: Built-in Swedish tax and accounting rules ensure you're always compliant with Skatteverket requirements.

insights.title: Make Better Decisions
insights.description: Real-time financial reports and insights help you understand your business performance at a glance.

trust.title: Trusted by Thousands of Swedish Businesses
trust.securityDescription: 256-bit encryption and secure data centers protect your financial data.
trust.complianceDescription: Built for Swedish accounting standards and tax regulations.
trust.gdprDescription: Full compliance with EU data protection regulations.
trust.infrastructureDescription: 99.9% uptime powered by Supabase and AWS.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free. Upgrade when you need more.

footer.description: Professional invoice and accounting software built for Swedish businesses.
